title: Riot and ZoneAlarm
body:
I am wondering when Riot will be fixing the issue with ZoneAlarm??

Every time there is a patch the game refuses to connect forcing you to shutdown your own firewall just to play, this has been an issue for a very long time with no response from Riot about what is being done.

Adding LoL files to the firewall exceptions does nothing to fix the issue either.

replies.body: Honestly, Zonealarm does more harm than good. You already have a firewall via your router.

> [{quoted}](name=Coldie,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=abKbewF1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T08:59:47.593+0000)
>
> Honestly, Zonealarm does more harm than good. You already have a firewall via your router.

I have never trusted hardware firewalls so have always had software as a backup.

It's not just ZA that is an issue, Windows and commodo firewalls have all had problems when it comes to this game, no other game I have played will refuse to load, its just LoL
